phrs.translation: 走调；不协调；（对某事）没有兴趣
v. 调整；调音；[口]开始演奏
校准(小提琴等乐器的)音调
vi. 改弦易辙，改变看法；改变论调

sentences.sentence: He tapped his feet, hummed tunes and jiggled around.
sentences.translation: 他拍着脚，哼着曲子并抖动着。

sentences.sentence: You can use this software to burn custom compilations of your favourite tunes.
sentences.translation: 你可以用这个软件刻制你最喜欢曲子的自选曲集。

sentences.sentence: We listen to children's shows on the radio, and Janey can sing along with all the tunes.
sentences.translation: 我们听着收音机上的儿童演出节目，珍妮能跟着所有的曲子一起哼唱。
